ThingDef.label: Tempestus Scion helmet
ThingDef.description: A Carapace Armor helmet worn by the Tempestus Scions. Just like the armor they wear, their helmets are more protective than their Guard equivalents. \n\nThe rivalry between the Tempestus Scions and the regular Astra Militarum is well-known, and continues even on this distant rimworld. The Guardsmen deride the Scions as “glory boys”, snapping up all of the best equipment and taking the glory for themselves as the regulars die in the mud. The Storm Troopers regard the regulars as lesser warriors - while most Guardsmen sign up at around 16 years of age, most of the Scions have trained from infancy under maximum pressure, and endure hardships to match.
